title: Amid Declining Ratings, Cable Networks Speed Up Reruns To Make Room For Ads
teaser: If you've been noticing that cable reruns of your favorite sitcom sound a little strange, you might be on to something. We'll look at the trend of compressing shows to make room for, of course, more commercials.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
